data.title: ContextLogic acquired US Salt for $907.5M, transforming into a business ownership platform with $2.9B NOLs.
data.description: The merger has resulted in the formation of a prominent public ownership platform with robust cash flow and holding approximately $2.9 billion in net operating losses (NOLs).

data.title: Surge Copper completes $20M private placement's first tranche.
data.description: Over 800 people have been reported missing in the aftermath of the recent natural disaster, with approximately 500 individuals still unaccounted for. The devastating event has led to over 200 casualties, with more than 300 injured. The search and rescue operations are ongoing to locate those missing and provide assistance to those affected. The authorities are urging the public to remain cautious and follow safety guidelines during this challenging time.

data.title: Columbus Circle Capital Corp II allows separate trading of Class A shares and warrants from Feb 27, 2026. Symbols CMII and CMIIW on Nasdaq.
data.description: Columbus Circle Capital Corp II (Nasdaq: CMIIU) revealed on Feb. 26, 2026, that starting from Feb. 27, 2026, holders of units from the Company’s initial public offering can opt to independently trade the Company’s Class A ordinary shares and warrants included in the units. Upon separation of the units, only whole warrants will be traded as no fractional warrants will be issued. The separated Class A ordinary shares and warrants will be listed on the Nasdaq Global Market with the symbols “CMII” and “CMIIW,” respectively. Units that remain unseparated will continue trading on the Nasdaq Global Market with the symbol “CMIIU.”

data.title: Sysco (NYSE:SYY) declares $0.54 per share dividend, payable on April 24, 2026 to stockholders of record on April 2.
data.description: Sysco Corporation (NYSE:SYY) based in Houston disclosed on February 26, 2026 that its Board of Directors has approved a quarterly cash dividend of $0.54 per share. This dividend is set to be distributed on April 24, 2026, to common stockholders holding shares as of April 2, 2026.

data.title: Red River Bancshares, Inc. increased its quarterly cash dividend to $0.25 per share, up 67% from $0.15, payable on March 19, 2026. CEO emphasizes commitment to capital return.
data.description: In Alexandria, Louisiana on February 26, 2026, Red River Bancshares, Inc. (Nasdaq: RRBI) shared news of a substantial financial move. The company's board of directors declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.25 per common stock share, marking a significant rise of $0.10 or about 67% compared to the previous quarter's $0.15 per share. This cash dividend will be disbursed on March 19, 2026, to shareholders noted in records by the end of business on March 9, 2026. R. Blake Chatelain, the President and Chief Executive Officer, expressed satisfaction saying, "We are thrilled to reveal this new increase in our quarterly dividend. Our augmented dividend mirrors our ongoing commitment to provide returns to our shareholders, all the while upholding solid capital ratios."

data.title: Stocks rebound after AMD-Meta deal worth $100 billion; AMD shares surge 9%, S&P 500 up 0.7%, Nasdaq 100 up 1.2%.
data.description: In the US, stocks bounced back on Tuesday after a significant drop on Monday prompted by economic concerns related to a cautionary report from Citrini Research about AI's impact on jobs. Investor confidence improved as Advanced Micro Devices Inc. (NASDAQ: AMD) secured a monumental $100 billion infrastructure deal with Meta Platforms Inc. (NASDAQ: META). Meta inked a 5-year agreement to buy AMD chips for its data centers, starting with one gigawatt this year and scaling up to six gigawatts. AMD's stock surged by 9%, stimulating a widespread rally in tech stocks. By midday in New York, the S&P 500 increased by 0.7%, the Dow Jones Industrial Average was up by 0.8%, and the Nasdaq 100 led with a 1.2% rise. Small-cap stocks also gained ground. Following a 4.7% dip on Monday, the iShares Tech-Expanded Software Sector ETF (NYSE: IGV) rebounded by 1.5%. Devalued software companies like Salesforce Inc. (NYSE: CRM) and Adobe Inc. (NASDAQ: ADBE) both saw approximately a 4% increase in share prices.

data.title: Verdad Resources sells entire oil and gas business to Peoria Resources, LLC, a subsidiary of JAPEX (U.S.) Corp.
data.description: In Denver on February 26, 2026, Verdad Resources Holdings LLC revealed the successful sale of its entire operated oil and gas business. Peoria Resources, LLC, a subsidiary of JAPEX (U.S.) Corp., acquired the business in the transaction.

data.title: Teachers Federal Credit Union and Corridor Platforms partner to launch Precision CUSO, enhancing AI-driven credit decisioning.
data.description: Hauppauge, NY and Haworth, NJ - On February 26, 2026, Precision CUSO introduced an AI-driven decisioning platform that facilitates approval automation, scalability, and sustainable competitiveness within the financial sector. This innovation has been adopted by Teachers Federal Credit Union, a leading credit union in the U.S. boasting a substantial member base exceeding a significant number.

data.title: Flashfood data shows increased demand for affordable meat and eggs. Protein makes up over 30% of sales, with a 28% increase in ground beef purchases from Jan 2025 to Jan 2026.
data.description: In New York, recent data from budget-friendly grocery app Flashfood shows a significant surge in the demand for inexpensive, fresh essentials like beef and eggs amidst growing financial pressure and soaring grocery costs in the United States. The statistics highlight a concerning affordability issue that is unfolding across the country. Currently, protein accounts for over 30% of all transactions on Flashfood's platform. A comparison of Flashfood's figures between January 2025 and January 2026 reveals a 28% rise in purchases of ground beef.

data.title: Weave to present at Raymond James conference on March 2, 2026; aims to discuss AI-powered solutions for healthcare practices.
data.description: Lehi, Utah-based company Weave, known for its AI-driven patient engagement and payment solutions for small to medium healthcare practices, shared plans to attend the 47th Raymond James Institutional Investors Conference at JW Marriott Grande Lakes in Orlando, Florida on March 2, 2026. The CEO Brett White and CFO Jason Christiansen will lead a fireside chat at the event. Weave, listed as WEAV on NYSE, is a prominent vertical SaaS platform in the healthcare sector.

data.title: Roofing expert Jordan Taylor offers advice to homeowners on responding to storm damage in Guntersville, AL.
data.description: In an article from HelloNation, Jordan Taylor of Superior Roofing Solutions in Guntersville, Alabama discusses the best course of action for homeowners facing roof damage from storms. The expert provides a step-by-step guide to help homeowners handle this situation effectively and safely. The article was published on February 26, 2026.

data.title: Northwest Bancshares, Inc. (Nasdaq: NWBI) will present at the 2026 Raymond James & Assoc. 47th Annual Investors Conf.
data.description: In Columbus, Ohio, on February 26, 2026, Northwest Bancshares, Inc. (Nasdaq: NWBI) announced its attendance at the 2026 Raymond James & Associates 47th Annual Institutional Investors Conference scheduled for Wednesday, March 4, 2026. Louis Torchio, serving as the President, Chief Executive Officer, and Director of the company, will be representing NWBI at the event.

data.title: Babcock & Wilcox schedules Q4 2025 conference call and webcast for March 16, 2026, at 5 p.m. ET. #BW
data.description: In Akron, Ohio, Babcock & Wilcox Enterprises, Inc. is scheduled to conduct a conference call and webcast on Monday, March 16, 2026, at 5 p.m. Eastern Time.

data.title: Empire State Realty Trust (NYSE: ESRT) to present at Citi’s CEO Conference on March 2, 2026, at 8:10 AM EST.
data.description: Empire State Realty Trust, Inc., listed under NYSE as ESRT, shared that Anthony E. Malkin, Chairman and CEO, and Christina Chiu, President, are slated to speak at Citi’s 31st Annual Global Property CEO Conference on March 2, 2026, at 8:10 AM Eastern time. Those interested can tune into a live audio-webcast in listen-only mode on the Company’s Investor Relations website during the roundtable discussion.
NVIDIA PRICE TARGET RAISED TO $265.00/SHARE FROM $250.00 BY JP MORGAN

data.title: Arevon Energy appoints Justin Johnson as Interim CEO on Feb 20, 2026. Johnson was the company's COO.
data.description: In Scottsdale, Arizona on February 26, 2026, Arevon Energy, Inc. revealed that Justin Johnson, their Chief Operating Officer, has taken on the role of Interim Chief Executive Officer starting from February 20. Arevon Energy, a prominent energy developer, owner, and operator based in the United States, made this decision known recently.

data.title: VTEX filed annual report on Form 20-F for 2025 on Feb 26, 2026. Available on SEC website and company's page.
data.description: In New York, VTEX (NYSE: VTEX) has disclosed its annual report for the year ending December 31, 2025, which was submitted to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) on February 26, 2026. The report is accessible through the SEC's website (www.sec.gov/edgar/) and can also be found on VTEX's official website (/www.investors.vtex.com/) as well as on the SEC's database under the Company's page (www.sec.gov/edgar/browse/?CIK=1793663&owner=exclude). Shareholders of Class A common stock are eligible to receive the report.

data.title: Cinemark (NYSE: CNK) to participate in institutional investor conferences on March 3 & 10, with CEO and SVP presenting.
data.description: Plano, Texas-based Cinemark Holdings, Inc. (NYSE: CNK), a major global movie theater chain, disclosed its involvement in upcoming institutional investor conferences. On Tuesday, March 3, the company will be partaking in the Morgan Stanley TMT Conference in San Francisco, CA. The attendees will include Sean Gamble, the President & CEO, and Chanda Brashears, the Senior Vice President of Investor Relations. They are scheduled for 1:1 investor meetings and a Fireside chat at 2:35 pm PT, which can be accessed at the provided link. Furthermore, the company is set to participate in the Deutsche Bank conference on Tuesday, March 10.

data.title: NIKE, Inc. plans to release Q3 fiscal 2026 results on April 2, 2026, followed by a 2:00 p.m. PT conference call.
data.description: Sportswear giant NIKE, Inc. (NYSE: NKE) is set to announce its financial performance for the third quarter of fiscal 2026 on April 2, 2026, at around 1:15 p.m. PT, post the closure of standard stock market hours. Subsequently, the company's management will conduct a conference call from 2:00 p.m. PT onwards to discuss the results. The call will be live-streamed on the web at https://investors.nike.com/. Investors and interested individuals who cannot participate live can access a recording later.

data.title: 1089 Inc. partners with Price Forbes and Lloyd's Syndicate 1922 to launch carbon asset insurance framework for transportation and energy sectors, advancing market participation.
data.description: In Boulder, Colorado and London, 1089 has introduced the initial insurance-supported carbon assets for the transportation and energy sectors, expanding institutional market involvement by providing Lloyd’s coverage.
